Subject: RE: [rest-discuss] Re: Is PUT with no entity allowed?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=330023347

Stephan Koops wrote:
>  > Mapping "200 OK" = allow and "404 Not Found" = deny is an abuse of 
> > HTTP response codes.
> 
> The design is, that a resource represents the right to do 
> something. Why is this now allowed?

I'm not saying that is not allowed. I'm just saying it is a bad idea.

- Brian
